SEARCH
Package user

Class Person

java.lang.Object
user.User
user.Person
Direct Known Subclasses:
Courier, Customer, Manager
public abstract class Person extends User
The Person class represents a person in the MyFoodora system. It extends the User class and provides methods for managing personal information.
Author:
Aymane Adib
